summary: A small town girl who moved to New York to pursue her dreams returns home for the holidays, only to realize that maybe her dreams aren't miles away, but right in her hometown.
cast: Sarah Lancaster|Brendan Penny|Gwynyth Walsh|Andrew Francis|Jessica Harmon|Garry Chalk|Anna Van Hooft|Steve Makaj|Mackenzie Gray|Vanessa Walsh|Arien Boey|Laiken Laverock|Imogen Tear|Tanya Champoux|Dana Stoutenburg|Leslie Mounterey|Ayva Branzei|Carter Devlin|Daniel Devlin|Jason Schombing
keywords: return to hometown|struggling actress|kiss on the lips|happy ending|ex boyfriend
title: Deseo concedido
